author: Michael Baez

asks.atool: Do you want to see some tool help (tool_id/0 quit) ?:
asks.acategory: Do you want to see some category (category_id/0 quit) : ?
asks.amenu: Do you want to create some symlinks in desktop and menu, must be root user (y/n) ?
asks.amenur: One or more menus have been changed, Do you want restore them, must be root user (y/n) ?
asks.asym: the program shorcut doesn't exists, Do you want create it, must be root user (y/n) ?
asks.asymr: the program shorcut had been modified, Do you want restore it, must be root user (y/n) ?
asks.asymd: Do you want delete the shorcuts, must be root user (y/n) ?
asks.ahelpman: Tool doesn't found, but can show you tool help
asks.adb: Database not found, Do you want download it (y/n) ?
asks.asearch: The tool doesn't found in the results, Do you want to see tool info (y/n) ?

conffile: Database hash not match in configuration file

conffile.menu: ;create a symbolic link to execute the script and create the menu entries on the desktop and in the main menu
conffile.pausekey: ;it does a pause when tool information or tool list is showing, you must press enter to continue or q to exit

cmd.intro:
[b]Kali Linux Tools[/b]

	Tools help collection from http://tools.kali.org

category.category:
category [keywords]		Show tools in a category

		keywords:		example id:1, name:information gathering

tool.tool:
tool [keywords]			Show tool help

		keywords:		example id:1, name:nmap

search.search:
search [keywords]		Search for tools

		keywords:		example author:paterva, name:nmap, content:http

show.show:
show [option]			Show categories or tools

		Option			example show categories, show tools

usage:
[b]Usage:[/b] ktools [ -h ] [ -c keywords ] [ -s keywords ] [ -t keywords ] [ -lc ] [ -lt ] [ -gui ]

	[b]Kali Linux Tools[/b]

	Tools help collection from http://tools.kali.org

	-c [keywords], --category [keywords]		Show tools in a category
		Keywords:				example ktools id:1, ktools name:information\ gathering
	-t  [keywords], --tool [keywords]		Show tool help
		Keywords:				example ktools id:1, ktools name:nmap
	-lc, --listcategories				Show all categories
	-lt, --listtools				Show all tools
	-s [keywords], --search [keywords] 		Search for tools
		Keywords:				example ktools author:paterva, ktools name:nmap, ktools content:http
	-g, --gui					Start ktools GUI
	-u, --updatedb					Download and update the database
	-h, --help					Show help
updatedb:
Database updated successfull !

	the database is already up to date

	Database hash format error

	Error while downloading database
